Package org.opentcs.util.configuration

Classes for loading and storing key/value pairs of configuration data.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Configuration
    This abstract class declares central configuration management methods that provide the possibility of making configuration data persistent and loading such persistent data.
    ConfigurationItem
    A single configuration item.
    ConfigurationStore
    This abstract class declares methods for storing and loading configuration data as key/value pairs.
    ConfigurationStore.NamespaceComparator
    A Comparator that compares the given stores' namespaces.
    ItemConstraint
    Constraints on a configuration item.
    ItemConstraintBoolean
    Item Constraint for Boolean type value.
    ItemConstraintByte
    Item Constraint for Bzte type value.
    ItemConstraintDouble
    Item Constraint for Double type value.
    ItemConstraintEnum
    Item Constraint for Boolean type value.
    ItemConstraintFloat
    Item Constraint for Float type value.
    ItemConstraintInteger
    Item Constraint for Integer type value.
    ItemConstraintLong
    Item Constraint for Long type value.
    ItemConstraintShort
    Item Constraint for Short type value.
    ItemConstraintString
    Item Constraint for String type value.
    PropertiesConfiguration
    This class realizes configuration management via Java Properties.
    SortedProperties
    A subclass of Properties for storing properties in lexicographical order.
    XMLConfiguration
    This class realizes configuration management in XML files.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConfigurationDataType
    A data type of a configuration item.

Package org.opentcs.util.configuration Description

Classes for loading and storing key/value pairs of configuration data.
